entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] An SSL error when sending request to server when using mac to deploy but successful when using windows and pair mac #87850
  • ComInterfaceGenerator does not allocate an array to pass as [Out] parameter in CCW #87845
  • Follow up items for Options validation source generator #87844
    8.0.0
  • AVX-512 debugger support: breakpoints #87843
    8.0.0
  • jit-diff produces random diffs on Linux due to relocs #87842
    Future
  • [browser][MT] WebSocket active issues #87839
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'unreached' in 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests.NFloatTests_GenericMath:MaxMagnitudeTest()' #87837
    8.0.0
  • Follow up on TarEntry feedback from PR #87534 #87835
    8.0.0
  • [ProfilerAPI] Different reserved region sizes reported for frozen segment #87834
  • [iOS] XCode 15 beta build failure - offset tool #87833
    8.0.0
  • Adding Request-Id header breaks distributed tracing on .NET Full Framework #87827
  • ComInterfaceGenerator produces two SYSLIB1051 on [In] parameters without [Out] #87824
  • [wasm] perf pipeline AOT compilation failures #87821
    8.0.0
  • why i add dotnet to path but application with --no-self-contained cannot run #87819
  • [Long Running Test] 'System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_SpanSyncForceNonBlocking.SendRecv_Stream_TCP_MultipleConcurrentReceives' #87815
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerSendsTrailingHeaders_Success #87814
  • Remove workaround for `EnableUnsafeBinaryFormatterSerialization` runtime property setting in tests #87811
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make `System.IO.Pipelines.Pipe.Length` from `internal` to `public` #87808
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.6.23316.32] Applications failed with Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #87807
  • Regressions in System.Threading.Tests.Perf_Timer #87826
  • `VectorXXX.WithElement` should not generate fallback code when the index is known to be constant and in range #87799
  • OSX/x64: TargetOS::IsMacOS returns false in jit codebase #87794

Closed

  • Config binder source-gen: .NET 7 app fails to compile with .NET 8 preview 4 package #86348
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a code generator to handle option validation #85475
    8.0.0
  • Process.WaitForExit(Int32) sometimes throws AggregateException on macOS #85717
    8.0.0
  • Test failure XmlSerializerTests.Xml_NookTypes #86563
    8.0.0
  • Test failure DataContractJsonSerializerTests.DCJS_BoolAsRoot #87755
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Private.Xml.Tests #87506
    8.0.0
  • Test failures: Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder.SourceGeneration.Tests #87508
    8.0.0
  • Emit a diagnostic when encountering JsonConverterAttribute annotations with inaccessible converter type constructors. #87140
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generation producing invalid code on generic JsonSerializable types #61782
    8.0.0
  • SourceGen build errors if JsonSerializableAttribute argument name 'type' is included #82997
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json using interpolated string with JsonSerializable.TypeInfoPropertyName fails with ArgumentException #69207
    8.0.0
  • JsonElement deserialization dispose behavior #87751
    8.0.0
  • Parallel.For performance degrades significantly after 2.14 billion milliseconds of system uptime #87543
  • Dependencies isolation bug in AssemblyLoadContext #87578
  • 1 XOR 1 computes to 1 in release mode #80711
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Mirrow (ReadOnly)Span<char> MemoryExtensions methods for (ReadOnly)Memory<char> #87763
  • Mono incorrectly handles nuint to floating-point conversions #69794
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Recommend string.ToLower{Invariant}().Contains/IndexOf/StartsWith("lowercasestring") be replaced by case-insensitive comparison #78606
    8.0.0
  • NullReferenceException when ManualResetEventSlim.Set #87761
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_54719/test54719/test54719 #87663
  • R2R known test failure #87716
  • SYSLIB1045 The code fix removes all curly braces on single line if statements in the file #87762
  • all flags(ars) to optimize for native aot #87698
  • NegotiateStream test deterministically fails locally on Windows 11 #79481
    8.0.0
  • Stopwatch class seems to have issues with AOT #87795
  • Mac Catalyst/ARM64 crash: * Assertion: should not be reached at /Users/runner/work/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/aot-runtime.c:4109 #87682

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix how jitrollingbuild disable Component Governance #87853
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Adjust determinism tests to store away the 2 different binaries that are generated #87852
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Accelerating Vector512.Sum() #87851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Make WebSockets work #87849
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • fixing an assert in GetGCMemoryInfo #87848
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Track last index in parameter marshalling #87846
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Try adding cross-compilers for Musl #87841
    needs-area-label
  • Add support for including System.Index and System.Range downlevel within dotnet/runtime #87840
    area-Meta
  • [DO NOT MERGE][mono] try to interrupt Monitor.Wait #87836
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add custom hosts file support to Dns #87832
    area-System.Net
  • Implement unidirectional GeneratedComInterface options #87831
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc build+test fixes #87830
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix support for JsonSerializerContext contained in struct types. #87829
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] PackedSimd, implement store methods #87828
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][interp] Add vectorization for Vector4 #87822
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Implement Stopwatch.ToString() #87812
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: Induce more physical promotions #87810
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #87805
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #87804
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix invalid datetimeoffset parsing #87801
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Use internal `BitOperations.ResetLowestSetBit` #87798
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution

Merged

  • Support config binding ext methods in options assembly #87733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Delete `IsCppCodegenTemporaryWorkaround` #87820
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix WBT dotnet.native.worker.js support #87823
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Fix some warnings. #87825
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add missing argument name when throwing ArgumentException #87797
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Options validation source generator #87587
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Fix a couple of issues related to Process.WaitForExit on Unix #87174
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Fix using ICU with Bionic and NativeAOT #87806
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tar: Ensure trailing separator in sanitized path for extraction #87534
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • SPMI: Handle -jitoption for tpdiff #87818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove usage of GeneratedRegex #86911
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Insert readbacks eagerly in physical promotion #87809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a number of source generator bugs. #87796
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Ensure that parsed JsonElement values are never marked as disposable. #87766
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Change Parallel to use Environment.TickCount64 #87800
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • minor WBT fixups for local testing #87817
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Support relative path for ICU_DAT_FILE_PATH on iOS/tvOS/Catalyst #87813
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [browser][MT] fix library tests, remove MonoWasmBuildVariant=perftrace #87549
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix symbol stripping on Windows #87802
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update version of MSDia and default to using shipped versions #87782
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Invoke `where` with `/Q` when looking for tools #87803
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2205134 #87788
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.9 #87776
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.20 #87775
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][mini] Fix conversion from r4/r8 to native u #85964
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix outerloop CI error #87789
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add missing Free methods for our Com interface marshallers. #87777
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to Logger and Logger<T> #87754
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Ensure that the various Min and Max APIs are accelerated where possible #87641
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [mono][aot] Fix an assertion. #87692
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Make idSmallCns signed to allow including -1 #87373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/7.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #87734
    area-Host, 7.0.x
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Stop allocating address exposed locals if they are unreferenced #87790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Apply iteration work limits to X509 certificate loading #87514
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Email addresses in same domain not equal #87721
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Refactor how diagnostics work in the interop generators #87700
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Make HTTP and WS clients work #87567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0-staging] Allow GetILFunctionBody for dynamic methods #87598
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.10
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Added IReadOnlyDictionary to HttpRequestOptions #86983
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Fix float to int/uint casting behavior #86941
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Added Vector128 intrinsics that depend on Vector64 for arm64 #87765
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • [wasm][globalization] `HybridGlobalization` remove code conditionally for `WasmBuildNative` #87170
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][jit] Enabling some Vector4 methods as Intrinsics on arm64. #87684
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Fix budgets for dynamic heap count and add smoothing to overhead computation #87618
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update WCF package versions #87787
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Return Matrix.Identity from static field instead of creating it every time #87723
    area-System.Numerics
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Expand interpreter PackedSimd support #87719
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Add some JIT helper functions to throw common corlib exceptions. #87044
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Do not use helpers for long div/mod/mul #2314
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable JS BigInt integration by default #2313

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Wasm separate DWARF debug to different file #2264
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable more tests and fix more bugs #2308
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Pass GC values in LLVM/WASM registers #2312
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cryptographic error "Padding is invalid and cannot be removed" #33437
  • The URL for downloading the .NET runtime when starting a fx-dependent app is incorrect #33435
  • Regression - ctrl-c handling commit from old dotnet/cli repo not merged into this repo #33417
  • Overeager check for RuntimeIdentifier when PublishAot=true #33414

Closed

  • [NET5] Winform application cannot be published to single file! #14785
    Discussion
  • Excessive CPU usage with dotnet run #21855
    Discussion
  • Build regression from .net core 3.1 to .net 5 #17099
    Discussion
  • dotnet sln add extremely slow when adding multiple projects #10719
  • Turn wpf vb template tests back #3678
  • `dotnet restore` of solution with .NET 5 SDK requires a package not required by the .NET Core 3.1 SDK #14689
  • Failed to run dotnet if temp directory is full #14631
  • Introduce `--aot` for simplify `PublishAot` #28615

PullRequests

Created

  • Add `--disable-build-servers` to Run and Store CLI commands #33445
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [Blazor] Embed browser static web assets into non browser TFM #33444
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Support setting workload set versions in global.json #33441
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33436
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add zsh compdef completion script. #14239
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2205511 #33303
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Source Link cross-targeting targets #33292
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Update to Svc Pool #33405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a unique error message when workloads are disabled but a customer is trying to use workloads #33406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Adding nullable reference type features to nullable value types (16.3, Core 3) #1865
    8.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add include disclaimer for speclets #7292

Updated

  • Collection literals: update type inference #7284

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CompletionRequest failed in C# DevKit #68704
  • Optimize SourceText.CalculateChecksum by leveraging System.IO.Hashing #68700
  • React to attribute centralization #68697
    C# 12.0
  • CLaSP and Language Server Public API #68696
    17.8

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33820.305 #68705
  • IDE0161 should be self-sufficient and documented #60546
    17.6 P2

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection literals: type inference #68703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.7
  • Ensure VisualStudioOptionPersister is only created once #68701
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Fix variable capture analysis in presense of parameter changes #68699
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Crossgen servicehub binaries for .NET 8 #68698
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Service cleanup #68681
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets - `lock` snippet and a lot of refactoring #68673
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update references to constant fields in parameter initializers when moving to primary constructors. #68620
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68693
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2204488 #68686

Updated

  • Add EA package for the compiler developer SDK #68628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update handling of collection literals with no target type #68598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Primary Constructors: Implement double storage warning for field initializers #68662
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Reduce allocations for LocalScopeBinder.BuildLocals #68684
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Flesh out implementation of ref-safety rules for inline array operations. #68597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Use primary constructors in the 'Features' layer. #68622
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Update Compiler Breaking Changes - post VS2019.md #68674
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Primary ctors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68635
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Add ReportIVTs compiler mode #68665
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • In blazor SSR, when setting @attribute [RenderModeServer], cascading parameter Task<AuthenticationState> always is null #48927
  • @microsoft/signalr (JavaScript) accessTokenFactory not providing access_token query param #48926
  • [browser][MT] Blazor E2E test with MT runtime #48925
    .NET 8.0
  • [Blazor] Issue when creating a folder of the name 'System' under Pages. #48924
  • Failed to load assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.RazorPages' #48923
  • Restore failing locally in main branch #48921
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc is getting depreciated but what would be workaround? #48920
  • How to automatically install the .NET SDK version specified in global.json when running restore.cmd? #48919
  • Included .resx file throws error when containing project is referenced from other project (.NET 6) #48916
  • Weird tracing results #48915
  • Add empty option for the Blazor Web App template #48913
    8.0-preview7
  • Surface option in the Blazor Web App template for WebAssembly interactivity #48912
    8.0-preview6
  • Xml Decryption can throw before forwarding on to custom Activator instance #48910
  • Blazor Server hosted behind Azure Frontdoor wrong BaseUri #48909

Closed

  • When adding Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing to test project, dotnet publish --no-build command fails with NETSDK1085 #40330
    Backlog
  • Backport fix for #43391 to .NET 6 #44215
    6.0.11
  • Add TryAddPolicyRegistry extension methods for IPolicyRegistry #47842
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #48905
  • Perf regression: https #48904
  • Not able to skip aspnetcore testcases with Mono runtime #48688
    Backlog
  • API Proposal ComponentState.LogicalParentComponentState #48557
    8.0-preview6
  • Ensure other features interact well with Sections #47621
    8.0-preview6
  • Blazor SSR forms redirect and antiforgery tokens? #48903
  • Does Preview 5 not support SupplyParameterFromForm? #48868
  • Blazor Server with Azure AD B2C and Azure SignalR authentication not working #48902

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove hosted option from blazor wasm template #48922
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Backport 48892 to 6.0 #48914
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Backport pr 48892 to 7.0 #48911
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime
  • Update SDK #48908
    area-infrastructure
  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Progressively enhanced navigation #48899
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Allow non-NetFramework tests to be skipped with Mono #48864
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • Call HttpContext.Abort() when WebSocket.Abort() is called. #48892
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview6
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • Improve GetAuthenticationStateAsync exception message #48812
    area-runtime, area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Update branding to 6.0.20 #48900
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.19
  • Sections with other features #48518
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • [wasm][debugging] Enable debugging when Device Toolbar is enabled and Iphone is selected #48527
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview6
  • Retain DOM nodes during streaming SSR updates #48258
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Remove route and method tags from rate limiting #48707
    area-runtime, area-middleware, 8.0-preview6
  • [release/7.0] Update NuGet client dependencies #48865
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.8

Updated

  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    area-infrastructure
  • Implement output-cache store using redis #48450
    feature-output-caching, area-middleware
  • Improve WebApplication debugging #48827
    area-runtime
  • Update ProjectTemplates to Id Web 2.12.2 + MS Graph v5 support #48863
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Draft: Add RedirectToActionOther method. #48823
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add EditContext.IsValid(..) to determine if a field has any associated validation messages #48698
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [skip-ci] Add missing xml docs for ExceptionHandler #48814
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Proof of concept for extending http logging #48679
    area-runtime
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #48414
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update docs: Linux dump analysis in a Windows environment #4002

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Trigger doesn't reset correctly when observable property is refreshed in OnAppearing method #15764
  • SemanticProperties.Description does not work on a span #15763
  • ScrollView with dynamically added Entries are not clickable #15762
  • Cannot interact with RadioButton on iOS in a Popup #15760
  • Fixing Invalidation Context error for MAUI iOS #15758
  • ColumnDefinition with * inconsistent #15757
  • Scroll Slow .Net Maui Android 7 CollectionView + slow tab switch Shell #15755
  • Maui - iOS build fails when resizing png file #15751
  • Placeholder font size not applied in editor on macOS and iOS #15750
  • Native support for Sharpen implementation in Android #15747
  • Native support for Blur implementation in Android #15745
  • DatePicker is not localization in the calendar view. #15744
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_New Recipe_Labels or Instructions: In "New Recipe" screen required fields are not marked up with any chevron/symbols. #15743
  • Publish exe - console show wrong outout #15742
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Screen reader: After changing the value for review, Screen reader is not announcing new value its announcing incorrect rating value. #15741
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_NonTextContrast: Disabled "Save" button is not looking like disabled. #15740
  • Project report issue #15736

Closed

  • Android publish: error NETSDK1191: A runtime identifier for the property 'SelfContained' couldn't be inferred #15696
  • Scroll to new view without tabs #15171
  • ListView GroupHeaderTemplate produces blank headers on iOS and MacCatalyst #13076
    .NET 8
  • Grid rows overlap when a cell content is wrapped #13315
    Backlog
  • Android: CollectionView.Scrolled returns wrong First/LastVisibleItemIndex when a Header/Footer is set #13471
    Backlog
  • Separate Window Management from IApplication #8823
    Backlog
  • Remote images not working in Image tag in latest version on Android #15735
  • [net7.0-iOS] Cannot debug my project with Linker disabled #15703
  • the screen szie of different mobile phones is how the page title is centered? #15712
  • Button in release, cannot change the background color #14153
  • .NET MAUI, how to load the iOS crash report to Visual Studio #15726

PullRequests

Created

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problem faced with transactions with EF6 for .net core 6 but was working fine in EF6 for .net framework #31112
  • EF 3.1 to EF 7 object creation changed behavior? #31111
  • Improve type mapping inference for primitive collections #31109
  • Would `DbSet<TEntity>.Remove(null)` throw? #31108
  • Migration error from ef 6 to ef 7. Error getting base type entities where one child has a required navigation property #31107

PullRequests

Created

  • Partial fix to type mapping inference for primitive collections #31110
  • Update SDK #31106

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31105
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NETSDKE2E] On Debian only, SDK dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.6.23310.1-x64.deb installing failed with error: archive 'dotnet-sdk-x64.deb' uses unknown compression for member 'control.tar.zst' ling faile #16646

PullRequests

Created

  • Exclude Windows components from sdk diff #16765

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #16762

Merged

  • SDK diff - fix for vstest and fsharp #16751

Updated

  • Update Implicit version for the 6b release #16746
